overview: Giorgio is twenty years old, he is a boy like many others and since he was a child he loves to do two things: jump in puddles and put on make-up. He lives stuck in the house with a big secret, with his grandfather Ulisse, now forced to bed and who keeps him anchored in his past. Pushed by his best friend Ilaria, after the death of his mother Rosa, Giorgio finds himself having to make a big choice: leave and be reborn in a new body or stay with his grandfather and continue living in a bad memory?
title: Hoppìpolla
